summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York discussing the production of witness statements that need to be anonymized. The sender requests a list of missing FBI 302 forms (witness interview reports) from witness folders to obtain from agents.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email requesting compilation of missing FBI 302 forms from witness folders for production after anonymization.

events.title: Request for Missing 302s
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails a request to compile a list of missing FBI 302 witness interview forms from witness folders to obtain from agents, noting the statements will be produced after anonymization.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 9, 2019, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
It discusses the planned production of witness statements that require anonymization.
It requests a compilation of a list of missing FBI 302 forms (witness interview reports) from witness folders to obtain from agents.
The email indicates an ongoing process of gathering and reviewing investigative materials related to witnesses.
